text: This is a list of specialist hospitals for treatment of cancer. ==Cancer Hospitals== *Hôpital Saint-Louis – founded in Rheims in 1742. This was the first cancer hospital in the world. It was initially on the Rue de Saint-Denis with two beds funded by a bequest of the canon, Jean Godinot. *Oeuvres du Calvaire – founded in Lyons in 1850 for women *Royal Marsden Hospital – founded in Westminster in 1851 as the Free Cancer Hospital – the first in the UK *Christie Hospital – founded in Manchester in 1892 as the Cancer Pavilion and Home for Incurables *New York Cancer Hospital – founded in 1884 as the first cancer hospital in the USA *Cancer Treatment Centers of America, Atlanta - Opened in 2012 in Goodyear, Arizonahttps://www.cancercenter.com/locations/atlanta *Cancer Treatment Centers of America, Chicago - Opened in 1988 in Zion, Illinoishttps://www.cancercenter.com/locations/chicago **Cancer Treatment Centers of America, Downtown Chicago - Opened in 2018 in Chicago, Illinoishttps://www.cancercenter.com/locations/chicago/downtown-chicago **Cancer Treatment Centers of America, Gurnee - Opened in 2018 in Gurnee, Illinoishttps://www.cancercenter.com/locations/chicago/gurnee *Cancer Treatment Centers of America, Philadelphia - Opened in 2005 in Philadelphia, Pennsylvaniahttps://www.cancercenter.com/locations/philadelphia *Cancer Treatment Centers of America, Phoenix - Opened in 2008 in Gilbert, Arizonahttps://www.cancercenter.com/locations/phoenix **Cancer Treatment Centers of America, Gilbert - Opened in 2018 in Phoenix, Arizonahttps://www.cancercenter.com/locations/phoenix/gilbert **Cancer Treatment Centers of America, North Phoenix - Opened in 2018 in Phoenix, Arizonahttps://www.cancercenter.com/locations/phoenix/north-phoenix **Cancer Treatment Centers of America, Scottsdale - Opened in 2018 in Scottsdale, Arizonahttps://www.cancercenter.com/locations/phoenix/scottsdale *Cancer Treatment Centers of America, Tulsa - Opened in 1990 in Tulsa, Oklahomahttps://www.cancercenter.com/locations/tulsa ==References== Category:Cancer hospitals
